title: Either nerf rylais or azir. One has to take a hit.
body:
Rylais is way too strong of an item right now and especially on azirs Slow it already makes guarenteed autos that do major damage. 

One has to go.

replies.body: I'd like to see Rylais take a small hit, maybe AOEs slow 30% rather than 40%, I also think Az's solders need to only proc the 20% pet slow.

25% for AoE/multitarget like it use to be.

That would be fine.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a7584nHo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-26T03:48:23.733+0000)
>
> I'd like to see Rylais take a small hit, maybe AOEs slow 30% rather than 40%, I also think Az's solders need to only proc the 20% pet slow.

THIS THE 20% PET SLOW.

Do not touch my Rylais. I'm a mage player without it I can't peel divers and kite aggressive meele. Even that takes some skill 5-10% lower slow will reduce it's usefulness to the point it isn't worth buying.

> [{quoted}](name=newbin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a7584nHo,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-26T08:00:40.336+0000)
>
> Do not touch my Rylais. I'm a mage player without it I can't peel divers and kite aggressive meele. Even that takes some skill 5-10% lower slow will reduce it's usefulness to the point it isn't worth buying.

Rylais is already too strong.

Idk why Azir WOULDN'T have the AOE slow...His soldiers deal AOE damage. Infact, his whole kit is aoe...except maybe his tower.

Imo, his soldiers just need a nerf. Their uptime is too ridiculous, even early game.

Just give Azir actual mana costs so he can't just rush Nashors into Rylais and then rape everyone. Why the hell he's able to get away without building mana items while nearly every other mage needs 1 is a mystery to me.
Azir is taking a hit to is early game damage in the next couple of patches

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a7584nHo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-25T22:01:11.031+0000)
>
> Azir is taking a hit to is early game damage in the next couple of patches

Source?
I think he is referring to a post in the dev corner. I don't recall it referencing the damage though. Only that Azir and Viktor were likely to be nerfed in a few patches.
it has too much ap health and its the best utility ap item. nerf the ap. by like an astounding 40

just like with other AP utility item, 

gut the AP on it. 

make them mages choose and make it a support item.
They should just make it consider the soldier autos as a pet attack/multi-hit (20% slow for 1 sec) rather than aoe (40% slow for 1 sec).
